title: Ken Block Explains His Racing - /SHAKEDOWN Interview
description: Leo Parente and ShakeDown talks Motorsport and Marketing with Ken Block - How he picks the events he races, How KB gets his Fiesta to do the tricks it does, What makes the challenge of WRC so tough.  When Ken visited the /DRIVE studios to talk Gymkhana 5, we had to take the opportunity to get to know Ken Block's racing a little better.  And, of course, we discuss Motorsport Marketing, something KB knows and masters so well.

asset.title: Ken Block Explains His Racing - /SHAKEDOWN Interview
asset.description:
Leo Parente and ShakeDown talks Motorsport and Marketing with Ken Block - How he picks the events he races, How KB gets his Fiesta to do the tricks it does, What makes the challenge of WRC so tough.  When Ken visited the /DRIVE studios to talk Gymkhana 5, we had to take the opportunity to get to know Ken Block's racing a little better.  And, of course, we discuss Motorsport Marketing, something KB knows and masters so well.
